Combat
Hit Points: 21 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 15 (strength; trained)
Armor: Chain Mail Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Greataxe (+7 1d12+2 S; strength; expert); Hand Adze (+7 1d4+2 S R10'; strength; expert); Jaws (+9 1d8+2 P; strength; expert); War Flail (+7 1d10+2 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Bite: Jaws inflict 1d6 HP P
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +1
Crunch: Jaws inflict 1d8 HP and have the grapple trait
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Great Kholo: +2 Hit Points
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Ant Kholo: +1 initiative when using Deception
Battle Cry: Can use Demoralize as a free action on a foe during initiative
Bonekeeper's Bane: Adjacent foes suffer -1 attacks and skill checks once per foe per day (save Will vs. higher of class or spell DC negates)
Great Kholo: +1 Athletics to Reposition, Shove, or Trip
Kholo Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon kholo weapons
Kholo Weapon Familiarity: Weapon Familiarity (Kholo Weapons; Flail; Khopesh; Mambele; War Flail)
Pack Stalker: Can extend Terrain Stalker effects to false within 10'
Rabid Sprint: (2) Strides three times
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Snagging Strike: (1) Successful melee Strike with the other hand free inflicts off-guard for 1 rd
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +7 (dexterity; expert); Will: +3 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Affliction Resistance: +1 vs. disease and poison, and successes vs. disease and poison are critical successes
Winter Kholo: Has cold resistance 1 and treats environmental cold as 1 step less extreme
Magic
Attack: Occult Innate: +5 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Occult Innate: 15 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Animal Form (O2): (2) Self becomes a Medium animal with 5 temporary HP, Armor Class 17, +9 attack, +1 damage, low-light vision, 30' imprecise scent, +9 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 3rd gives 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 18, +14 attack, +5 damage, +14 Athletics; 4th becomes a Large creature with 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 19, +16 attack, +9 damage, +16 Athletics; 5th becomes a Huge creature with 15' reach, 20 temporary HP, Armor Class 19, +18 attack, +7 damage with double damage dice, +20 Athletics)
Augury (O2): (10 min) Reveals whether the results of a proposed action up to 30 min in the future will be generally good or bad
Figment (OC1): (2) R30' Creates a simply illusory sound or vision while sustained
Impaling Spike (O1): (2) TODO
Ventriloquism (O1): (2) TODO
Magic Notes:
Ancestor's Rage: Knows the Animal Form occult innate spell; can cast it at 5th rank once per day to become a canine
Distant Cackle: Knows the Ventriloquism occult innate spell; can cast it once per day at rank 1
Grandmother's Wisdom: Knows the Augury occult innate spell; can cast it twice a day at 2nd rank
Impaling Bone: Knows the Impaling Spike occult innate spell; can cast it once per day at 7th rank to affect corporeal or incorporeal targets
Witch Kholo: Knows the Figment occult innate cantrip; can cast it at will
